scripts.extensions:install: cd web && npm ci && cd ../common && npm ci && cd ../extensions && npm ci && cd ./common-pos && npm ci && cd ../purchase-orders-pos && npm ci && cd ../work-orders-pos && npm ci
scripts.extensions:build: cd web && npm run build && cd ../common && npm run build && cd ../extensions/common-pos && npm run build && cd ../purchase-orders-pos && npm run check && cd ../work-orders-pos && npm run check
scripts.app:install: cd common && npm ci && cd ../web && npm ci && cd frontend && npm ci
scripts.app:build: cd common && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build && cd frontend && npm run build
